title: Virtual Microscope-Based Histology Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Blended Learning in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Tech Environments Combining Offline Sessions with Mobile-Based Virtual Microscopy Activities

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and name 15 or more types of tissue structures in digital slides.
Learners can analyze three core characteristics of tissue samples (cell arrangement, color variation, structural patterns) using a virtual microscope interface.
Learners can monitor their navigation patterns through learning analytics tools and improve two or more learning strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
